string-array.name: content
string-array.item: Ukrainian residents in an occupied city have been hailed for their bravery and “amazing courage” as Russia reacts with “brutal” force.
He’s called his ex-wife a “c**t” and a “stupid f**k”, but the internet is calling for “justice” for Johnny Depp – and there’s an obvious reason why.
Treasurer Josh Frydenberg has refused to show up for a debate in his electorate claiming the platform was skewed against him.
Prime Minister Scott Morrison is sweating over potential interest rate hikes as inflation spikes to its highest level in more than two decades.
A 59-year-old Brisbane man has been killed in a fatal crash during the Targa Tasmania tarmac rally, local police have confirmed.
A witness in Ben Roberts-Smith’s defamation lawsuit has been bailed after being arrested following an alleged altercation with police.

string-array.name: content1

He’s called his ex-wife a “c**t” and a “stupid f**k”, but the internet is calling for “justice” for Johnny Depp – and there’s an obvious reason why.
Treasurer Josh Frydenberg has refused to show up for a debate in his electorate claiming the platform was skewed against him.

string-array.name: title
string-array.item: ‘The worst’: Russia reacts with ‘brutal’ act
